publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4935 John Wilson: Agricultural Wages Order—That the Parliament welcomes the Agricultural Wages (Scotland) Order (No 56) 2008 that came into effect on 1 October 2008, setting the minimum rates of pay and conditions to which workers in the agricultural sector are entitled by law, and notes that the order offers vital protection from gang masters, especially to workers who work long hours often on low pay and conditions.

S3M-4935 John Wilson: Agricultural Wages Order—That the Parliament welcomes the Agricultural Wages (Scotland) Order (No 56) 2008 that came into effect on 1 October 2008, setting the minimum rates of pay and conditions to which workers in the agricultural sector are entitled by law, and notes that the order offers vital protection from gang masters, especially to workers who work long hours, often on low pay and conditions.
S3M-4935 Agricultural Wages Order (lodged on 24 September 2009) Jamie Hepburn*, Kenneth Gibson*, Alasdair Allan*, Sandra White*, Christina McKelvie*, Bill Wilson*
S3M-4935 Agricultural Wages Order (lodged on 24 September 2009) Stuart McMillan*, Bill Kidd*
S3M-4935 Agricultural Wages Order (lodged on 24 September 2009) Dave Thompson*, Brian Adam*, Gil Paterson*
